ABOUT_MODULE

The Curious Approach

CurioxityLabs builds open-source tools for the next generation of secure, observable, and intelligent infrastructure.

Our projects span PromptRacer for AI prompt optimization, a cloud-native 5G Core, high-performance Rust eBPF tools, CipherTrace for cryptographic inventory, and PQ Traffic Tester for post-quantum validation.

Our philosophy: deep curiosity meets rigorous engineering. Every line of code is crafted with the precision of a systems engineer and the wonder of an explorer.
